projects.name: User Book
projects.description: A simple project in React Native using an API that lists users and delete them. Two tabs for users have be made in which Active and Deleted Users are stored.

projects.name: App Tracker
projects.description: A simple project in ReactJS using an Firebase SDK as backend, It is basically a smaller version of JIRA in which tickets are created for tasks and organizations are registered. And users can register to those organization and view the projects that they are part of.

projects.name: Contact Manager
projects.description: It is a simple project built on React, along with the firebase as a backend. To store the contacts of individual person.
